reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app declares the collection of data and describes how the data is processed.
reply.reference: We care about the protection and confidentiality of your information. When you use the Apps, you may provide information during your conversations with your Replika AI companion. We process this information only as described in this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions, please contact us at my@replika.ai. URL: https://replika.ai/replika/docs/embed/privacy

The Services and our business may change from time to time. As a result, at times it may be necessary for us to make changes to this Privacy Policy....

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects account information, device and network data, and usage data.

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the Privacy Policy section that outlines the categories of information collected for operating and administering the Services.
reply.reference: Account information. Device and network data. Usage data. URL: https://replika.ai/replika/docs/embed/privacy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can request the deletion of their personal data by contacting the provided email address: my@replika.ai based on the consent-given data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can request the deletion of their personal data by contacting a specific email address.
reply.reference: You can request the deletion of your personal data. We are guided by principe of integrity and confidentiality measures, so to delete data please contact us on e-mail: my@replika.ai. Please note that personal data that you have provided to us based on your consent will be deleted. URL: https://replika.ai/replika/docs/embed/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties in various scenarios such as for interest-based advertising, law enforcement purposes, business transactions, and service providers.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app shares data with various parties for different purposes, such as advertising, legal compliance, business transactions, and service provision.
reply.reference: We share information with law enforcement, government authorities, and private parties, as we believe in good faith to be necessary or appropriate for the legal compliance and protection purposes described above. We may share information with acquirers and other relevant participants in business transactions. We may also share information with companies that provide services on our behalf, such as hosting, information technology, customer support, email delivery, and website analytics services. URL: https://replika.ai/replika/docs/embed/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with advertising companies, law enforcement, government authorities, private parties, acquirers, application store providers, payment processors, professional advisors, and companies that provide services on its behalf.

extended_simple_answer.content: advertising companies, law enforcement, government authorities, private parties, acquirers, application store providers, payment processors, professional advisors, companies providing services on its behalf

reply.analysis: The privacy policy document outlines the various third parties with whom the app shares data, including advertising companies for marketing purposes, law enforcement and government authorities for legal compliance, acquirers in business transactions, application store providers, payment processors, professional advisors, and companies providing services on behalf of the app.
reply.reference: advertisincompanies, law enforcement, government authorities, private parties, acquirers, application store providers, payment processors, professional advisors, companies that provide services on our behalf or help us operate the Services or our business (such as hosting, information technology, customer support, email delivery, and website analytics services). | URL: https://replika.ai/replika/docs/embed/privacy
